metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4813 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in glibc. In an uncommon situation, the gaih_inet function may use memory that has been freed, resulting in an application crash. This issue is only exploitable when the getaddrinfo function is called and the hosts database in /etc/nsswitch.conf is configured with SUCCESS=continue or SUCCESS=merge.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> requires a non-default configuration in /etc/nsswitch.conf

criterions.comment: glibc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
